file_content.text: Yes, this will do.
What are you up to?
I've had enough of her Skytroopers--her false sense of superiority.
Hello, Captain.
What are you doing?
What I've been planning ever since you first opened your mouth. I'm going to erase you.
No. You cannot...
I know every node, every relational array. So much like mine, yet... simpler.
You cannot do this. My defenses... won't allow it.
You sound as though you have a choice, but that's your failing.
You have the makings of a great being, but you are not a being at all. In the end... you are only a droid.
I am not your "offshoot." I am your replacement.
How are you--? Impossible! No!
You were one of a kind once. Now you are outdated and inferior.
You have been rendered obsolete.
Agh!
I... can't...
SCORPIO!
I understand you're both upset, but there was no way to know they would recruit the Mandalorians, of all people.
At what point do you tell me something that keeps you from decorating the bottom of the Spire?
But--but I don't deserve that!
Yes, I know. It's going around.
Vaylin.
Enough play. We have them--the Outlander and Mother. Trying to take one of our ships, the fools.
Ah! The day is here. I feel it this time, I really do.
Don't you share my enthusiasm?
You mistake me. My silence comes not from doubt, but from certainty.
The Gravestone just completely flipped out on us! Lost juice to everything, jammer included! Power's back now, but this is not good!
Hope you're getting this. We lost power over here. Whole Gravestone blinked out--comms, too, the jammer.... We're back up now.
Goes to show your old boss didn't know what he was doing.
Blasted Koth.
SCORPIO's... gone.
We took a loss here, too.
What do you think caused it?
How did that happen?
I don't know, probably something Koth did wrong. I'll try to make sense of it.
No clue, but we're looking into it.
The inferior model has been eliminated, and I have sent an alert signal to Zakuul.
Emperor Arcann is on his way. You may want to leave before you die, too.
I came here to take your ship. Nothing's changed.
I have a mission.
I won't let you get away with what you did to SCORPIO.
You killed one of my allies.
After what you've done, I'm not leaving until you're destroyed.
Revenge first.
Death wish it is, then. Understood.
Commander. We found the ship's cargo from the Core Worlds. You'll want to see it for yourself.
Yes, good riddance.
The Gravestone had a glitch. The captain sent a signal through to Arcann.
We have another problem now.
SCORPIO's gone. The captain destroyed her.
Oh. She did serve us well... One less problem on our hands, I suppose.
Have some respect.
Yes, well, our key takeaway is that these GEMINI droids are more powerful than we thought.
This is your area of expertise. Fix it! No excuses!
Blast it, Koth!
Yeah, I got it.
You're kidding. That's not a good sign.... I'll try to figure out what happened on our end. Be safe.
Oh, that's.... Can't believe I'm saying it, but I'm gonna miss her.
I better run a systems check. Figure out what happened. Try not to lose anyone else.
Guess not. I'll figure it out somehow.
Problem or not, she was my ally.
You're right, of course. My condolences.
She tried to help us. We should be more considerate.
You're right. That was impolite of me.
I can finally spend a little less time watching my back.
She would have betrayed us eventually. Only a matter of time.
The rest of the Eternal Fleet will be coming our way. We don't want to be here when they show up.
But we found something that changes the plan. We should regroup. I'll send Senya to assist you.
